mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, GENDER, NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMAGE, EMAIL, BIRTHDAY, CREATED_AT, STATUS) VALUES (MEMBER_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{login_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{nickname}, #{profile_image}, #{email}, #{birthday}, sysdate, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET NICKNAME = #{nickname}, EMAIL = #{email}, PASSWORD = #{password}, PROFILE_IMAGE = #{profile_image} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
